name: Can't Stop: Dice Game
description:
Fully-featured popular dice game based on "Can't Stop" board game:

* Play online with friends or strangers!
* Play offline: Pass and Play or against AI!
* 2-4 players.
* Try out different game variations or stick to the classic version!
* Push Notifications tell you when it's your turn.


Your friends can join your game even if they don't have the app. The app is needed to create new games and play offline games.
